headline: A New Migrant Tide? Not if Croatia Has Its Way
abstract: The Bosnian-Croatian border is one of the last gateways to northern Europe. The Croatian police are trying to seal it, often in brutal fashion.
lead_paragraph: GLINICA, Bosnia and Herzegovina â€” The hills on the Bosnian-Croatian border have not been a battleground since the end of the Bosnian war, a quarter-century ago. But to some farmers in remote parts of the Bosnian side, it sometimes still resembles a conflict zone.
keywords: Middle East and Africa Migrant Crisis
